heading: Mirror’s Edge Catalyst: Inspirations
subheading: Join Erik Odeldahl (Design Director) to hear about the upcoming Mirror’s Edge Catalyst. Discover Faith’s origin story.

heading: The Technology Behind Dying Light
subheading: Pawel Rohleder, Director of Research & Technology Development at Techland, discusses how technology can affect the experience of gamers

heading: Rock, Paper, Shotgun presents: Evolving CRPGs - Divinity: Original Sin 2
subheading: Swen Vincke, Creative Director & Founder of Larian Studios explains how to overcome the challenges of pen-&-paper like freedom in a story-driven RPG.

heading: Rock, Paper, Shotgun presents: The Art of Firewatch
subheading: Artist Olly Moss and animator James Benson of Campo Santo explain how they recreated the great American landscape of the Wyoming wilderness in Firewatch.

heading: Panel session: What Will VR Games Be Like?
subheading: Panellists from Triangular Pixels, nDreams and Rebellion discuss what they believe gamers can expect from upcoming VR games.

heading: The Eurogamer Podcast
subheading: Join host Chris Bratt, Rock, Paper, Shotgun's Philippa Warr, Eurogamer Editor Oli Welsh and guests for a live edition of the Eurogamer.net podcast!

heading: Storming the Castle! Total War: WARHAMMER
subheading: Join us as Andre Arsenault, Lead Battle AI Programmer on Total War: WARHAMMER, explores the latest advancements in Total War siege battle AI.

heading: Rock, Paper, Shotgun presents: Sunless Sea Retrospective
subheading: Developer Liam McDonald and producerLottie Bevan talk about 2015's Sunless Sea and present the latest version of upcoming expansion Zubmariner.

heading: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide
subheading: In this presentation Liam O'Neill (Associate Producer) will talk you through the development and release of Vermintide sharing insight into the future of the game.

heading: A Bullfrog and Lionhead retrospective
subheading: Eurogamer editor Oli Welsh is joined by a panel of Bullfrog and Lionhead alumni to celebrate the studios' unique achievements, from Dungeon Keeper to Fable.

heading: Panel: The Present & Future of Narrative in Games
subheading: Rock, Paper, Shotgun's John Walker hosts a discussion on story in games with Inkle founder Jon Ingold and Chris Gardiner, Head Writer at Failbetter Games.

heading: The Creative Assembly GameJam
subheading: Join us as our hardworking teams present their final games. Who will impress our panel of expert judges and come out on top Friday?
